Preface.Name: Add item
Preface.Summary: The developer adds a new item to his workspace

Preconditions.Precondition: The item is not currently in the workspace
The item is in a directory that is currently in the workspace

FlowElement.Step: The user invokes the VS.NET command File.AddNewItem or File.AddExistingItem
The item is added to the working copy

Postconditions.Postcondition: The item is in the workspace
